info.title: Browser Use Public API v2
info.summary: Browser Use API for running web agents (v2)

get.description: Get authenticated account information including credit balance and account details.

404.description: Project for a given API key not found!

get.description: Get paginated list of AI agent tasks with optional filtering by session and status.

post.description:
Create and start a new task.

You can either:
1. Start a new task without a sessionId (auto-creates a session with US proxy by default).
   Note: Tasks without a sessionId are one-off tasks that automatically close the session
   upon completion (keep_alive=false). Use sessionSettings to configure the auto-created
   session (e.g. proxyCountryCode, profileId, screen dimensions).
2. Start a new task in an existing session (reuse for follow-up tasks or custom configuration)

Note: Without sessionSettings, a US proxy is enabled by default. Providing sessionSettings
overrides defaults — proxy is only enabled if proxyCountryCode is set. For full control over
session configuration (e.g. keep_alive), create a session first via POST /sessions with your
desired settings, then pass that sessionId when creating tasks.

400.description: Session is stopped or has running task

get.description: Get detailed task information including status, progress, steps, and file outputs.

patch.description: Control task execution with stop, pause, resume, or stop task and session actions.

get.description:
Lightweight endpoint optimized for polling task status.

Returns only the task status, output, and cost without loading steps,
files, or session details. Use this endpoint for efficient polling
instead of GET /tasks/{task_id}.

Recommended polling pattern:
1. POST /tasks to create a task
2. Poll GET /tasks/{task_id}/status until status is 'finished' or 'stopped'
3. GET /tasks/{task_id} once at the end for full details including steps
Get secure download URL for task execution logs with step-by-step details.
Get paginated list of AI agent sessions with optional status filtering.

post.description: Create a new session with a new task.

402.description: Insufficient credits to start a session

get.description: Get detailed session information including status, URLs, and task details.

patch.description: Stop a session and all its running tasks.

delete.description: Delete a session with all its tasks.

get.description: Get public share information including URL and usage statistics.

schema.title: Response 404 Get Session Public Share Sessions  Session Id  Public Share Get

post.description: Create or return existing public share for a session.

delete.description: Remove public share for a session.

post.summary: Agent Session Upload File Presigned Url
post.description: Generate a secure presigned URL for uploading files to an agent session.

post.summary: Browser Session Upload File Presigned Url
post.description: Generate a secure presigned URL for uploading files to a browser session.

get.summary: Get Task Output File Presigned Url
get.description: Get secure download URL for an output file generated by the AI agent.

schema.title: Response 404 Get Task Output File Presigned Url Files Tasks  Task Id  Output Files  File Id  Get

post.description:
Profiles allow you to preserve the state of the browser between tasks.

They are most commonly used to allow users to preserve the log-in state in the agent between tasks.
You'd normally create one profile per user and then use it for all their tasks.

You can create a new profile by calling this endpoint.

delete.description: Permanently delete a browser profile and its configuration.

get.description: Get paginated list of browser sessions with optional status filtering.

post.description:
Create a new browser session.

**Pricing:** Browser sessions are charged per hour with tiered pricing:
- Pay As You Go users: $0.06/hour
- Business/Scaleup subscribers: $0.03/hour (50% discount)

The full rate is charged upfront when the session starts.
When you stop the session, any unused time is automatically refunded proportionally.

Billing is rounded up to the minute (minimum 1 minute).
For example, if you stop a session after 30 minutes, you'll be refunded half the charged amount.

**Session Limits:**
- All users: Up to 4 hours per session

get.description: Get detailed browser session information including status and URLs.

patch.description:
Stop a browser session.

**Refund:** When you stop a session, unused time is automatically refunded.
If the session ran for less than 1 hour, you'll receive a proportional refund.
Billing is ceil to the nearest minute (minimum 1 minute).

profileId.title: Profile ID
profileId.description: The ID of the profile to use for the session

startUrl.description: URL to navigate to when the session starts.

browserScreenWidth.title: Browser Screen Width
browserScreenWidth.description: Custom screen width in pixels for the browser.

browserScreenHeight.title: Browser Screen Height
browserScreenHeight.description: Custom screen height in pixels for the browser.

persistMemory.title: Persist Memory
persistMemory.description: If True (default), tasks in this session share memory and history with each other, allowing follow-up tasks to continue from previous context. If False, each task runs as a standalone task without any previous task context.

keepAlive.title: Keep Alive
keepAlive.description: If True (default), the browser session stays alive after tasks complete, allowing follow-up tasks. If False, the session is closed immediately after task completion. Set to False for simple one-off tasks to reduce session idle time.

customProxy.title: Custom Proxy
customProxy.description: Custom proxy settings to use for the session. If not provided, our proxies will be used. Custom proxies are only available for Business and Scaleup subscribers.

TaskStatus.title: TaskStatus
TaskStatus.description:
Enumeration of possible task execution states

Attributes:
        CREATED: Task has been created but not yet started.
    STARTED: Task has been started and is currently running.
    FINISHED: Task has finished and the agent has completed the task.
    STOPPED: Task execution has been manually stopped (cannot be resumed).

output.title: Output
output.description: Final output/result of the task (null while running)

finishedAt.title: Finished At
finishedAt.description: Naive UTC timestamp when the task completed (null if still running)

isSuccess.title: Is Success
isSuccess.description: Whether the task was successful based on the agent's self-reported output

cost.title: Cost
cost.description: Total cost of the task in USD

TaskStatusView.title: TaskStatusView
TaskStatusView.description:
Lightweight view optimized for polling. Use GET /tasks/{id}/status for efficient polling
instead of GET /tasks/{id} which loads full step details.

number.title: Number
number.description: Sequential step number within the task

evaluationPreviousGoal.title: Evaluation Previous Goal
evaluationPreviousGoal.description: Agent's evaluation of the previous goal completion

nextGoal.title: Next Goal
nextGoal.description: The goal for the next step

url.title: URL
url.description: Current URL the browser is on for this step

screenshotUrl.title: Screenshot URL
screenshotUrl.description: Optional URL to the screenshot taken at this step

actions.title: Actions
actions.description: List of stringified json actions performed by the agent in this step

TaskStepView.title: TaskStepView
TaskStepView.description: View model for representing a single step in a task's execution

TaskUpdateAction.title: TaskUpdateAction
TaskUpdateAction.description:
Available actions that can be performed on a task

Attributes:
    STOP: Stop the current task execution
    STOP_TASK_AND_SESSION: Stop both the task and its parent session

llm.title: LLM
llm.description: The LLM model used for this task represented as a string

task.title: Task
task.description: The task prompt/instruction given to the agent

status.title: Status
status.description: Current status of the task execution

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: Naive UTC timestamp when the task was created

startedAt.title: Started At
startedAt.description: Naive UTC timestamp when the task was started (None if task has not started yet)

finishedAt.title: Finished At
finishedAt.description: Naive UTC timestamp when the task completed (None if still running)

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Optional additional metadata associated with the task set by the user

browserUseVersion.title: Browser Use Version
browserUseVersion.description: Version of browser-use used for this task (older tasks may not have this set)

isSuccess.title: Is Success
isSuccess.description: Whether the task was successful based on the agent's self-reported output (less reliable than the judge)

judgement.title: Judgement
judgement.description: Stringified JSON object containing the full report from the judge

judgeVerdict.title: Judge Verdict
judgeVerdict.description: Judge verdict - True if the judge found the task to be successful, False otherwise (None if judge is not enabled)

cost.title: Cost
cost.description: Total cost of the task in USD. This is the sum of all step costs incurred during task execution.

suggestions.title: Suggestions
suggestions.description: List of actionable suggestions for improving task configuration based on detected issues during execution.

TaskView.title: TaskView
TaskView.description: View model for representing a task with its execution details

detail.title: Detail
detail.default: Too many concurrent active sessions. Please wait for one to finish, kill one, or upgrade your plan.

TooManyConcurrentActiveSessionsError.title: TooManyConcurrentActiveSessionsError
TooManyConcurrentActiveSessionsError.description: Error response when user has too many concurrent active sessions

UnsupportedContentTypeError.title: UnsupportedContentTypeError
UnsupportedContentTypeError.description: Error response for unsupported content types

action.title: Action
action.description: The action to perform on the session

UpdateBrowserSessionRequest.title: UpdateBrowserSessionRequest
UpdateBrowserSessionRequest.description: Request model for updating browser session state.

action.title: Action
action.description: The action to perform on the session

UpdateSessionRequest.title: UpdateSessionRequest
UpdateSessionRequest.description: Request model for updating session state.

title.title: Title
title.description: Display name for the skill (shows up in the public view)

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of what the skill does (shows up in the public view)

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Categories to assign to the skill

isEnabled.title: Isenabled
isEnabled.description: Whether the skill is enabled for execution

action.title: Action
action.description: The action to perform on the task

UpdateTaskRequest.title: UpdateTaskRequest
UpdateTaskRequest.description: Request model for updating task state

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL to upload the file to.

method.title: Method
method.description: The HTTP method to use for the upload.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: The form fields to include in the upload request.

fileName.title: File Name
fileName.description: The name of the file to upload (should be referenced when user wants to use the file in a task).

expiresIn.title: Expires In
expiresIn.description: The number of seconds until the presigned URL expires.

UploadFilePresignedUrlResponse.title: UploadFilePresignedUrlResponse
UploadFilePresignedUrlResponse.description: Response model for a presigned upload URL.

fileName.title: File Name
fileName.description: The name of the file to upload

contentType.title: Content Type
contentType.description: The content type of the file to upload

UploadFileRequest.title: UploadFileRequest
UploadFileRequest.description: Request model for uploading a file to the user's files bucket.

app__endpoints__api__v2__marketplace__sk.title: InsufficientCreditsError
app__endpoints__api__v2__marketplace__sk.description: Error response when there are insufficient credits

app__endpoints__api__v2__skills__views__.title: InsufficientCreditsError
app__endpoints__api__v2__skills__views__.description: Error response when there are insufficient credits
